>
[Sage's Lash](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1072)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Apex" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=10" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Necromancy" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=117" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 189 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Price** 24,000 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** worn belt

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

The thin, glittering strands of rope that comprise this thick belt appear to be spun gold. Strung along the front of the belt are a collection of four multicolored, perfectly spherical beads: jade, turquoise, quartz, and amethyst. While wearing the lash, you gain a +3 item bonus to [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13). When you invest the belt, you either increase your Wisdom score by 2 or to 18, whichever would give you a higher score.
